channel.title: ╚»★RevealedX V2★«╝ [Development] [Apply within]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.servimg.com/u/f45/16/65/23/76/reveal10.png[/img]
Welcome to the RevealedX V2 Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.
[b][u]Information about RevealedX:[/b] We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new outlook at RevealedX. I have recently just got back into dealing with private servers and I wanted to take a fresh start with a fresh base. We are looking forward to becoming part of the team, but please make sure you understand the basic idea of the server itself before applying.
[b][u]Server Goals:[/b] • Create the most stable server possible. • Create one of the best economys known to exist. • Create a large dedicated player base. • Add features that have never been seen before. • Create a genuinley coded server. • Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game and knows how to handle problems.
[b][u]Server Features:[/b] • Full summoning with BoB. • Fully re-done Dungeoneering System, with 5 floors. • Decent player base. • Terminated most memory leaks. • Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest) • Added a raiding system. • Custom ::yelltag's • All 614 Items • 525 Models • Added an efficient Activity Points System. • Spirit Shield effects. • Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager. • Added 2 additional Donator Ranks • Added new DH system with a manager. • All extreme potions • Overloads • Rocktail effects • Fixed prayer draining. • Quick Prayers • Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions • Re-did Godwars. • Rs hit fades • Rs Korasi special attack • Fixed models going through players • 'Face North' • Loyalties • A LOT MORE!
[b][u]Media:[/b] Coming Soon!
[b]Positions Available:[/b]
[b][u]Server Programmer[/b] (0/2) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]Forum Programmer[/b] (0/1) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the forum and site itself. Must be an experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 30 minutes a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]Videographer[/b] (0/1) - A user who is knowleged and skilled with making videos of updates, as well as tutorials for the server. Must be able to output at least 1 good video a week.
[b][u]Client Programmer[/b] (0/1) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]Forum Moderator[/b] (0/2) - A user who: - Works well with other users - Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users - Manages forums well - Creates a clean and safe environment for all users - Is able to punish other users - A user who does not take preference Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.
[b][u]In-game Moderator[/b] (0/2) - A user who: - Works well with other users - Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users - Manages game well - Must agree to and abide by the Handbook that will be given upon acception - Creates a clean and safe environment for all users - Is able to punish other users - A user who does not take preference Must work a minimum of 3-4 hours a day, with no maximum.
[b]Application Format:[/b]
[code]Name: IGN: Age: Position applying for: Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: Hours Available: Time Zone: Experience: Proof of Work(if applies): Capability with Coding(if applies): MSN: Skype (optional): Other contact (optional):[/code][/center]

Don’t listen to him, just another “Jokesonyou” kid. ;)[quote=“Teh_Noob, post:8, topic:418370”]I’m sorry, as a member once said, I cannot get off something I am not setting on.[/quote] I said this to you, LMFAO. And its sitting not setting.

item.description:
@Teh_Noob1 wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:11, topic:418370”]I’m pretty sure I don’t lack imagination… I have written an entire staff handbook, thought up 10+ minigame ideas, drawn up donator zones, new home areas, etc. I have been working for the past week straight on this project and I have reached a point to where I need help.[/quote]Pretty much every I have played on had all those contents you just named, that’s what I mean, do something no other server has.

Read full topic

item.title: ╚»★RevealedX V2★«╝ [Development] [Apply within]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:5, topic:418370”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=520913.msg3784524#msg3784524 date=1318748344]
Using the center font doesn’t make it unique. Make it to the right.

PI loading 600+ gfx won’t ever be stable due to the gfx overloads. Your goals are too ambitious, and ordinary. Create some unique goals.

Guess…Good luck…
[/quote]

My goals might be ambitious but where did anyone ever get without ambition? Bee tee dubs we are sitting on around .17% engine load per player. So decently stable already.

EDIT: That is really freaking hard to read when it’s to the right. lmao.[/quote]
Ok? Just saying…

Read full topic

item.title: ╚»★RevealedX V2★«╝ [Development] [Apply within]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[center]

reveal10.png1024×200

Welcome to the RevealedX V2 Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.

[u]Information about RevealedX:
We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new
outlook at RevealedX. I have recently just got back into dealing with private servers and I wanted to take a fresh start with a fresh base. We are looking forward to becoming part of the team, but please make sure you understand the basic idea of the server itself before applying.

[u]Server Goals:
• Create the most stable server possible.
• Create one of the best economys known to exist.
• Create a large dedicated player base.
• Add features that have never been seen before.
• Create a genuinley coded server.
• Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game and knows how to handle problems.

[u]Server Features:
• Full summoning with BoB.
• Fully re-done Dungeoneering System, with 5 floors.
• Decent player base.
• Terminated most memory leaks.
• Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest)
• Added a raiding system.
• Custom ::yelltag’s
• All 614 Items
• 525 Models
• Added an efficient Activity Points System.
• Spirit Shield effects.
• Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager.
• Added 2 additional Donator Ranks
• Added new DH system with a manager.
• All extreme potions
• Overloads
• Rocktail effects
• Fixed prayer draining.
• Quick Prayers
• Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions
• Re-did Godwars.
• Rs hit fades
• Rs Korasi special attack
• Fixed models going through players
• ‘Face North’
• Loyalties
• A LOT MORE!

[u]Media:
Coming Soon!

Positions Available:

[u]Server Programmer (0/2) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Forum Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the forum and site itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 30 minutes a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Videographer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged and skilled with making videos of updates, as well as tutorials for the server. Must be able to output at least 1 good video a week.

[u]Client Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an
experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

[u]Forum Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages forums well
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.

[u]In-game Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages game well
  • Must agree to and abide by the Handbook that will be given upon acception
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 3-4 hours a day, with no maximum.

Application Format:

Name: IGN: Age: Position applying for: Secondary Position if not chosen for the first position: Hours Available: Time Zone: Experience: Proof of Work(if applies): Capability with Coding(if applies): MSN: Skype (optional): Other contact (optional):[/center]

Read full topic
